OOC:Then learn your weapons a sword is a sword and a Lance means lance. Also 
I hate refering to the rules but I'm not a rude person maybe vulgar and 
cocky but not rude so I am not going to call you a cheater Prebon  or moder 
or whatever you call rule breakers in this game I just ask that you read and 
follow the close quaters combat rules. As for the Ninja comments my reply to 
that is: If you want to battle with a wolf pack you must learn to adjust to 
each members driffences or you other wise always lose.

::Koj::
Koj laying flat on his back and cloaked start to wonder how many days he 
been here and whats taking Inu-Yasha.


::Inu-Yasha::

Cuts off his jets and scans for Koj "Damn he used Metal petals." Inu-Yasha 
fires a wide array of fire burning away the petals and start to scan again.


::Koj::
Koj quickly stands up and flys of towards Inu-Yasha and lands on his back. 
"About time did you get the data?"


::Inu::
"Yeah, Were are we going?"

::Koj::
Koj thinks for a minute "The Ark."

::Both::
Fly off towards the Ark.
